TopicTitle: Wings break off after loading a quicksave

Articles.Content:
I just tried Dynawing re-entry scenario in 1.2.0.1586. Made a quicksave in close approach to KSC. Landed safely. Then loaded the save again - and now, the wings break off a split second after the save loads. I heard of this bug in pre-release, but this is now 1.2. Is the bug still persistent? Or is there another reason at play?

Unmoded game, plain vanilla with default settings, no cheats.

Same problem here ! KSP 1.2.2

Testing a shuttle landing and immediately after loading the quicksave my wings are blown and to make things worse - no "revert flight" option, so 3 kerbins will die !

Unmoded as well

Not heard of the bug.. and you think I would have?
Well apart from this one I found http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/9590
But that one was unreliable to reproduce and wasn't the same vessel (in fact it was reported that only the stearwing was affected, but not 100% of the time).

Do you see anything in the logs when this occurs? Or can you supply saves and log files of this occurring and raise on the bug tracker?
If reliable reproduction steps can be supplied along with logs and saves in a bug tracker report then a developer can look at it.
Raising it on here, will not get a dev to look at the problem.
